main.node: 从Grist获取关心的用户列表

nodes.name: 从Grist获取关心的用户列表
Add Extra Fields
nodes.notes: Set tweet raw url link && fullname

parameters.content:
## How to get private channel chat id

1. You should convert the private channel to public with some `@channelName`

2. Send a message to this channel through the Bot API:

https://api.telegram.org/bot{bot_token}/sendMessage?chat_id=@{channel_name}&text=hello

3. As the response, you will get information with chat_id of your channel.

```json
{
  "ok" : true,
  "result" : {
    "chat" : {
      **"id" : -1001005582487,**
      "title" : "Test Private Channel",
      "type" : "channel"
    },
    "date" : 1448245538,
    "message_id" : 7,
    "text" : "123ds"
  }
}
```
Now you can convert the channel back to private (by deleting the channel's link) and send a message directly to the chat_id `-1001005582487`:

https://api.telegram.org/bot{bot_token}/sendMessage?chat_id=-1001005582487&text=123

PS: chat_id no need `@` symbol now.
根据上次执行的时间来过滤tweet信息时，会因为获取tweet的延迟，导致漏掉很多tweet无法发送出来，因此改用保存ID的形式来使用
